column4: hello, When i login to gnome, I choose Visual Effects -> extra, but when I reboot, it gets back to no effects, then I have to switch to extra again. How can I make it stay?
when you are about to log in, you can try choosing a nother session maybe
or what erUSUL said but create a startup application with the command 'compiz --replace'
that's right, I didn't think about it. :)
